example.title: Support multiple languages with i18n (Internationalization)
example.message: Hello, {name}! Welcome to the example page for i18n in this {projectName} project. Hopefully, you can make your projects accessible to more people around the world by using this feature. I'd like to end this message by quoting Nelson Mandela: "If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his own language, that goes to his heart."
